doc.title: Value

value.content: In the context of data or an object wrapper around that data, the value is the primitive value that the object wrapper contains. In the context of a variable or property, the value can be either a primitive or an object reference.

value.title: See also
value.content: • Primitive wrapper class on Wikipedia
